author: mturk
msg: Added acquire and release connection functions.
The acquire pulls the connection from the pool.
The release returns the connection to the pool.

author: mturk
msg: conn_rec for opened connection. It is used bt http(s) and ftp for
bounding the backend connection to client connection with the same id's.

author: mturk

author: mturk
msg: ap_proxy_connect_to_backend. It uses worker params for setting socket
options and checks for conection's connect status.
It works both on empty and acquired connections.

author: mturk
msg: Added iobuffersize and receivebuffersize to be worker specific.
As for timeout their default value is from proxy_conf.
